articles.title: A man died after a party boat capsized on a Texas lake during bad weather - CNN
articles.description: A Texas man is dead and another person was injured after a double-decker party boat capsized in bad weather Saturday night on a lake north of Houston, the Texas Parks and Wildlife Department said in a statement.
